title: Anthony Konyegwachie
text: Anthony Konyegwachie (born 10 May 1970) is a Nigerian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201988%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Featherweight">men's featherweight</a> event at the <a href="1988%20Summer%20Olympics">1988 Summer Olympics</a>. At the 1988 Summer Olympics, he lost to <a href="Daniel%20Dumitrescu">Daniel Dumitrescu</a> of Romania.
